description: '''Duncan Sheik''' (born November 18, 1969) is an American singer-songwriter, composer, and actor. Sheik is known for his 1996 debut single "[[Barely Breathing]]", which earned him a [[Grammy Award]] nomination for [[Best Male Pop Vocal Performance]]. He has composed music for motion pictures and Broadway musicals, winning the 2007 [[Tony Awards]] for Best Original Score and Best Orchestrations for his work on the musical ''[[Spring Awakening (musical)|Spring Awakening]]''.
